author: Ruth Ben-Ghiat
description: Ruth Ben-Ghiat: the encounter between a Montana GOP candidate and a reporter spotlights a strain of violence becoming increasingly visible under Donald Trump.
title: Montana is a perfect storm for the GOP

author: Ed Lane
description: Partial results from a special election for a U.S. House of Representative seat in Montana show Republican Greg Gianforte won Montana's U.S. House special election after being charged with assaulting reporter, the Associated Press reports.
title: Republican Greg Gianforte wins Montana's U.S. House special election: AP

description: Witnesses said the Republican candidate for Montana's sole congressional seat body-slammed a reporter Wednesday, the day before the polls close in the nationally watched special election.
title: Montana GOP Candidate Charged With Misdemeanor Assault of Reporter

author: Janet Hook
description: Republican Greg Gianforte won a hotly contested House race in Montana, holding on to a GOP seat despite an 11th-hour charge of assaulting a reporter.
title: Republican Scores Victory in Montana House Special Election

author: Chris D'Angelo, Nick Visser, Daniel Marans
description: The altercation happened on the eve of Montana's hotly contested special election for a U.S. House seat.
title: Montana GOP Candidate Charged With Assault After 'Body-Slamming' Reporter

author: Seaborn Larson
description: A reporter for the Guardian was allegedly assaulted by Greg Gianforte, the Republican candidate in the Montana U.S. House race, the reporter said via Twitter.
title: Montana GOP candidate cited after reporter alleged he was ‘body slammed’

author: Lauren Gambino
description: The House speaker said: ‘That’s wrong and should not happen’ of incident in which Greg Gianforte assaulted Guardian reporter Ben Jacobs in Montana
title: Paul Ryan calls on Montana candidate to apologize for assaulting Guardian reporter

author: Adam Shaw
description: Montana isn’t known for exciting political races, but a race for an open House seat has turned into a cocktail of “House of Cards” and WWE.
title: Montana House race heats up as bodies fly and Dems smell blood

author:
Cameron DaSilva                    

                                    
                        @camdasilva
description: Kansas City's trade for Montana altered the future of both the Chiefs and the 49ers.
title: 6 things you didn’t know about the 9th biggest trade in NFL history: Joe Montana to the Chiefs | FOX Sports

author: Madeleine Sheehan Perkins
description: Montana's special election to fill the state's only seat in the House is set for Thursday.
title: Democrats torch Montana GOP rival Greg Gianforte over alleged body slamming incident
